>
[Coldstar Pistols](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2361)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Unique" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=161" />
<trait label="Artifact" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=253" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 178 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** 1
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Base Weapon** [Dueling Pistol](/Weapons.aspx?ID=201)
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

One [dueling pistol](/Weapons.aspx?ID=201) in this paired set is etched with flames along its barrel, while the other is etched with icicles. In these separate forms, one gun comprising the _Coldstar Pistols_ functions as a _+3 [greater striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [greater flaming](/Equipment.aspx?ID=295) dueling pistol_ and the other as a _+3 greater striking [greater frost](/Equipment.aspx?ID=296) dueling pistol_. When joined, the guns form a double-barreled weapon that functions as a _+4 major striking greater flaming greater frost dueling pistol_. The combined form has a [range increment](/Traits.aspx?ID=248) of 120 feet. In either form, the Coldstar Pistols have the [agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [concealable](/Traits.aspx?ID=327), [concussive](/Traits.aspx?ID=401), and [fatal d10 traits](/Traits.aspx?ID=178). As star guns, the _Coldstar Pistols_ run on magic and don't use ammunition or black powder.

**Activate** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([manipulate](/Traits.aspx?ID=645))    **Effect** You switch the _Coldstar Pistols_ from one form to the other. Attempt a [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) check to [Feint](/Actions.aspx?ID=48) with a +4 circumstance bonus.

**Activate** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([manipulate](/Traits.aspx?ID=645)) **Frequency** once per round;   **Effect** Make two Strikes against one target, taking the highest of the two attack rolls and applying it to both attacks. Your multiple attack penalty increases only after these Strikes.

**Destruction** If Deft Onki's name and deeds ever fade from mortal memory entirely, the _Coldstar Pistols_ can be destroyed like a normal object.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
